title: PBE
body: I have sent a PBE request like 3/4 months ago and i haven't been accepted. I just want to know if i have done something wrong and if my request has been sent. Like at the moment you are making this blood moon mode where you play only assassins and they are my favorite type of champions (Sorry for my bad English i just want to know if my Request has been send) {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Unfortunately, simply applying for PBE access doesn't guarantee you access. The criteria used to select testers changes quite a lot, depending on what we're testing at the time. The best thing you can do while waiting to see if you receive an invite is to *actively play* League while being a positive influence on your fellow summoners. Check out our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more details on how the system works.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
Invite on what, E-mail? League client notification? Same story for me.
You'll receive notification via email if you're accepted. Make sure your email is updated on your account so you'll be sure to see it!
